mapper.select: select education, career, employmentType, exSalary, disableGrade, picture, exArea, exField, military, actNum, actPeriod, actSector, actContent from( select education, career, employmentType, exSalary, disableGrade, picture, exArea, exField, military, actNum, actPeriod, actSector, actContent from( select r.memberID, r.education, r.career, r.employmentType, r.exSalary, r.disableGrade, r.picture, r.exArea, r.exField, r.military, a.actNum, a.actPeriod, a.actSector, a.actContent from ResumeInfo r, ExternalActivity a where r.memberID = a.memberID and r.memberID = #{memberID} order by actNum ASC ) )
mapper.insert: insert into ExternalActivity (actNum, actPeriod, actSector, actContent, memberID) values ((select nvl(max(actNum),0)+1 from ExternalActivity), #{actPeriod}, #{actSector}, #{actContent}, #{memberID})
